title: God Did You Call Me A Toilet
description: God Did You Call Me A Toilet is the tool youâ€™ll enjoy reading. It is informative, innovative, and written in a style everyone will understand. The analogy and familiarity of the rooms in a house make understanding the purpose and function of each 5-Fold Ministry Gift easy and enjoyable.Anyone who has ever had questions about their Godly "Call", 5-Fold Ministers, or how they operate in the Body of Christ will definitely find this book a wonderful resource
